Chabua - BANK OF BOGORITOLIA AREA UNDER CHABUA CIRCLE | BOGORITOLIA 
AREA (GPS CO-ORDINATES ARE - 27.33'6.57"N/95.8'53.68"E TO 27.33'6.66"N/95.8'52.75"E) | 
AN Embankment damaged REPORT IS RECEIVED FROM WATER RESOURCE 
DEPARTMENT AS ON 11-07-2023 WHERE SEVERE INFRASTRUCTURE DAMAGES HAS 
BEEN REPORTED AT BOGORITOLIA AREA. AROUND 20M OF PREVIOUSLY RESTORED 
WORKS HAS BEEN DAMAGED. PALLATIVE MEASURES IN THE FORM OF LAUNCHING 
OF GEOBAGS ARE CURRENTLY UNDERWAY. REACHED LENGTH - 20M. | (Long - 
27.330000, Lat - 95.800000, Dept - Water Resource Deptt.)

column3:
Halem - Culvert Damaged | Cross Drainage Works -Karibil Kachari to Boroi TE Road from Ch.0.00 m to 
2000.00 m, (A construction ongoing work under MMPPNA for the year 2022-23 Gohpur LAC.) 
(Pkg.No.MMPPNA_22_23_162)Double row Hume Pipe Culvert at Ch. 800.00m, which was under 
construction, has been damaged by flood water of Karibil Suti and rain water from surrounding catchment 
areas . The cushioning top layer materials and approaches have been washed away by the flood water. 
Lat.26.917842 Long.-93.441498. Reported by PWRD, damaged on 10/07/2023.,  
Power Dept. Poles | In Buroighat 4 nos. Of 11KV (8.5M long) pole & electric line along with materials are 
damaged due to flood reported on 7/7/23 by APDCL, Gohpur

Bihpuria - Culvert Approach Road Damaged | Due to erosion of approach of RCC Culvert no. 1/1 on 
Harmutty Petition road at Ch. 800.00 occurred due to flood water of Bogoli river and has damaged hard crust. 
Immediate restoration works started as reported by AEE, PWRD, Nowboicha TRSD on 11/07/2023,  
Nowboicha - Power Dept. Conductors | Approx 14.85 KM conductor damaged due to Flood on 08.07.2023 to 
10.07.2023. As reported by JE, APDCL, Nowboicha Sub- Division on 11.07.2023,  
Power Dept. Poles | Approx 17 Nos. Of poles ( PSC pole 7.5- 7 Nos, PSC Pole 8.5- 10 Nos.) Damaged due to 
Flood on 08.07.2023 to 10.07.2023. As reported by JE, APDCL, Nowboicha Sub- Division on 11.07.2023

Athani - Kaunbari | Erosion occurred at village Kawnbari under Rangamati Mouza by River Tipkai from dated

staff it has been found that 3B-2K-10L of Land has already been eroded. No family has been affected by the 
erosion. | 0 | (Long - 90.083655, Lat - 26.146681)
Jorhat West - Revenue village : Deka Satra Bhakat. PLace : Sapekhati Spur NO.8 . Date: 11/07/2023 | Due to

the rainfall , River Brahmaputra has eroded an area about 700 m at the upstream of Spur No. VIII at Sapekhati 
. | 0 | (Long - 94.124065, Lat - 26.838730)
